document_data.mainbody:
Jimmy was a human pirate from the isle of Brynnlaw who sailed the Bleedin Mary in the Sea of Swords in the late 14 century DR.
Jimmy was a large and jolly man with sun-kissed skin and shiny bald head.
In the , Jimmy could be found drinking in the Vulgar Monkey dock-side tavern. Like so many fellow pirate customers of the rowdy establishment, Jimmy was an avid shanty-singer. I Flounder an Den I Lobster, a seafood-pun-filled shanty was his favorite to drunkenly sing.
